Package de.db.derpate.servlet.filter.validation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InputValidator
    The InputValidator interface can be used with the ParameterValidationFilter to protect a HttpServlet against invalid requests
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FormatValidator
    Filters by a given Format
    IdValidator
    Validates, that an database id is existent
    LengthValidator
    This InputValidator can check, if a string has at least a certain length
    NumberValidator
    This InputValidator checks if a given String is a number and if it is in a range, if specified
    PatternValidator
    This InputValidator checks if a pattern can be applied
